title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.10 - Method of wagering
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.10 - Method of wagering

State Regulations

The method of selling pari-mutuel tickets shall be
approved by the commission and the State Tax Commission. No employee of a
licensed track assigned to or working in the pari-mutuel department shall
accept a wager from any person except through the track's pari-mutuel windows
and in the regular course of business. No employee of the pari-mutuel
department of any licensed corporation or association shall be permitted to bet
during those periods of any day that such person is actually working in such
capacity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4122.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
